bibl.note: Voir pp. 149-181: Inscriptions grecques (Nos 104-114), coptes et gréco-coptes (Nos 115-122). Les 2 séries comportent quelques stèles inédites.

MARTIN Geoffrey Thorndike, with contributions by S.J. CLACKSON †, S.G.J. QUIRKE, J.D. RAY, J. REYNOLDS, J. VAN DER VLIET and G.J. VAN GELDER, Photography by Andrew NORMAN, Stelae from Egypt and Nubia in the Fitzwilliam Museum, Cambridge, c. 3000 BC-AD 1150.
